channel.title: Aws on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Aws on Blog

item.title: re:Invent 2018
item.description: My company was gracious enough to send me to AWS re:Invent 2018 this year!

item.title: Istio Egress to DynamoDB
item.description: Took a while to figure out how to properly configure Istio egress to allow a service to talk to DynamoDB. I didn’t find many up-to-date resources out there on the topic, so decided to share what worked for me.
